meaningMnemonic: Under the <radical>ground</radical>, which you dug into, you found two great finds. You found <kanji>both</kanji> a <radical>mountain</radical> and a <radical>head</radical>, two strange things to find underground.
readingMnemonic: But, you dig too deep and water flows into where you are. Your only hope is a <reading>row</reading> (りょう) boat floating off in the distance.
